bibl.title: Military Orders for Jesse W. Lazear, July 30, 1900

div1.p: Lazear is ordered to proceed to Pinar Del Rio to collect pathological material on the recent yellow fever outbreak.

div1.head: Military Orders for Jesse W. Lazear, July 30, 1900
div1.opener:
C1
B18
HEADQUARTERS DEPARTMENT OF WESTERN CUBA.
Quemados, July 30, 1900.
Special Orders,
No. 5.
div1.p:
2.---Upon the recommendation of the Acting Chief Surgeon,
Acting Assistant Surgeon Jessie W. Lazear, U. S. Army, will proceed
to Pinar del Rio Barracks, for the purpose of collecting certain
pathological material, and ascertaining certain facts connected
with the recent outbreak of yellow fever at that post.

Upon completion of this duty he will rejoin his proper
station.
The travel enjoined is necessary for the public service.
div1.closer:
BY COMMAND OF BRIGADIER GENERAL LEE: R. E. L. MICHIE,
ASSISTANT ADJUTANT GENERAL.
